html.p: The Splunkt iOS app allows Splunk staff to capture QR code data from event attendee badges (or allow them to enter the attendees details manually). It also gives Splunk staff the opportunity to enter information about their conversation with the attendee (i.e products or use-cases discussed).
All data collected from the app about the attendee is stored in a Splunk index.
Using Splunk we can easily export data to third-party marketing tools as well as using Splunk searches for deep analytics.
It will help you make more money and make your job easier.
We can better track the conversations we’re having with prospects and customers to help us sell more effectively. Using Splunkt you can:

ul.li: Measure t-shirt hand-outs vs. closed opportunities

html.p: Splunkt is available for iOS (Apple) and Android devices. Email dgreenwood@splunk.com.

Click “Apply” to sync setting with your iOS device

Open the file on the device and select install
